meanings.definition: The act or process of counting or calculating.
meanings.sent1: In math class, we practiced numerations by adding and subtracting numbers.
meanings.sent2: The numerations of the coins in the jar helped us figure out how much money we had.
meanings.sent3: The numerations of the cookies in the jar mysteriously changed overnight.
meanings.sent4: Her numerations of the stars in the sky seemed to create patterns only she could see.
meanings.sent5: The numerations of the puzzle pieces made it easier to put the picture together.

meanings.definition: A system of counting or numbering.
meanings.sent1: The library uses a unique numerations to organize books on the shelves.
meanings.sent2: The numerations of the pages in the book helped readers find specific information.
meanings.sent3: The numerations of the animals in the zoo made it easy for visitors to locate their favorites.
meanings.sent4: The numerations of the trees in the forest seemed to form a natural map.
meanings.sent5: The numerations of the keys on the piano guided the musician's fingers to the right notes.

meanings.definition: A list or record of numbers.
meanings.sent1: The numerations on the spreadsheet showed the company's financial data.
meanings.sent2: The numerations on the chart helped the scientist analyze the experiment results.
meanings.sent3: The numerations on the grocery list seemed to grow longer every time she went shopping.
meanings.sent4: The numerations on the scoreboard determined the winner of the game.
meanings.sent5: The numerations on the map indicated the locations of different landmarks.
